A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So disappointed with this movie! It had so much potential and even though it's visually stunning (other than Snoke's CGI)\, Disney have turned Star Wars into a politically correct\, let's tick as many diversity boxes as possible whilst eroding everything that we love about Star Wars\, kids film. Rubbish storyline\, wasted characters and a worse script.  As an avid Star Wars fan this is simply awful.
